医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
利用关键基因控制的分子途径提高小麦产量阿德莱德大学的一项研究发现，传统上用于控制小麦开花行为的基因调控的分子途径可以被改变，以获得更高的产量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Harnessing-molecular-pathways-governed-by-key-gene-to-enhance-wheat-yields.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Harnessing-molecular-pathways-governed-by-key-gene-to-enhance-wheat-yields.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83f16ad1-1958-43e2-8be2-52f990f02c77 Thu, 23 May 2024 16:15:42 -0400 Harnessing molecular pathways governed by key gene to enhance wheat yields
研究深入了解影响老年人停止驾驶的因素哪些因素导致老年人不再开车？一项新的研究跟踪没有记忆或思维问题的老年人来研究这个问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-offers-insights-into-factors-influencing-older-adults-to-stop-driven.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-offers-insights-into-factors-influencing-older-adults-to-stop-driven.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a3ffa66-1b50-4644-b3c5-acdf5b678693 Thu, 23 May 2024 16:10:15 -0400 Study offers insights into factors influencing older adults to stop driving
研究揭示社交媒体使用与噩梦之间的联系，影响睡眠和心理健康研究人员根据无力感和受害等主题创建了一个量表来检测与社交媒体相关的不良梦境。他们发现社交媒体的使用与睡眠质量差、情绪健康和噩梦之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-reveals-link- Between-social-media-use-and-nightmares-impacting-sleep-and-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-reveals-link- Between-social-media-use-and-nightmares-impacting-sleep-and-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86c77f41-55ac-42c8-9846-f90c8f947d3e Thu, 23 May 2024 16:07:00 -0400 Study reveals link between social media use and nightmares, impacting sleep and mental health
Insilico Medicine 在 BIO 大会上发挥领导作用，解决人工智能药物发现的关键挑战临床阶段人工智能 (AI) 驱动的药物发现公司 Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）的领导层将出席 6 月 3 日至 6 日在圣地亚哥举行的 BIO 国际大会，并就人工智能药物发现面临的关键问题发表演讲。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Insilico-Medicines-leadership-to-address-key-challenges-in-AI-drug-discovery-at-BIO-Convention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Insilico-Medicines-leadership-to-address-key-challenges-in-AI-drug-discovery-at-BIO-Convention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30753456-bb0e-4599-9e29-4e104cd3ee0d Thu, 23 May 2024 16:04:50 -0400 Insilico Medicine's leadership to address key challenges in AI drug discovery at BIO Convention
突破性研究揭示了阿尔茨海默病进展的分子驱动因素据美国疾病控制与预防中心称，目前至少有 580 万美国人患有阿尔茨海默病，这是最常见的痴呆症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Breakthrough-study-reveals-molecular-drivers-of-Alzheimers-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Breakthrough-study-reveals-molecular-drivers-of-Alzheimers-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b3ef3c5-9323-4dae-964d-1b6845de931f Thu, 23 May 2024 15:57:25 -0400 Breakthrough study reveals molecular drivers of Alzheimer's progression
新的光遗传学方法可以提供更好的肌肉控制并减少疲劳对于瘫痪或截肢的人来说，用电流人为刺激肌肉收缩的神经假体系统可以帮助他们恢复肢体功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/New-optogenics-approach-may-offer-better-muscle-control-with-less-fatigue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/New-optogenics-approach-may-offer-better-muscle-control-with-less-fatigue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81b3fcec-29da-4f88-841f-1d629a5e60f1 Thu, 23 May 2024 15:47:34 -0400 New optogenetics approach may offer better muscle control with less fatigue
研究量化了母乳喂养的健康和经济效益苏格兰格拉斯哥人口健康中心的 Tomi Ajetunmobi 本周在开放获取期刊 PLOS ONE 上发表的一项新研究表明，母乳可以通过减少儿童疾病和早期医疗保健利用率来促进公平的儿童健康并节省医疗费用和同事们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-quantizes-health-and-economic-benefits-of-breastfeeding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-quantizes-health-and-economic-benefits-of-breastfeeding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=264da532-34e9-4a33-a6f3-f1f66adf2f68 Thu, 23 May 2024 15:42:18 -0400 Study quantifies health and economic benefits of breastfeeding
评估 3D 能量多普勒在附件肿块鉴别诊断中的性能三维能量多普勒（3DPD）超声已用于评估附件肿块，在本研究中，我们旨在进行荟萃分析，以评估其在附件肿块鉴别诊断中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Evaluating-the-performance-of-3D-power-Doppler-in- Differential-diagnosis-of-adnexal-masses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Evaluating-the-performance-of-3D-power-Doppler-in- Differential-diagnosis-of-adnexal-masses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=922e7eb8-edd6-4fcb-87e4-44c8f59ce623 Thu, 23 May 2024 15:38:05 -0400 Evaluating the performance of 3D power Doppler in differential diagnosis of adnexal masses
研究鱼孢子虫细胞分裂机制的进化细胞分裂是生命的基础，使所有生物体（从单细胞细菌到复杂的多细胞动物）都能生长、繁殖和生存。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Investigating-the-evolution-of-cell-division-mechanisms-in-Ichthyosporea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Investigating-the-evolution-of-cell-division-mechanisms-in-Ichthyosporea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6faba6a-506c-4a9b-bf28-0e1666cb20af Thu, 23 May 2024 15:30:34 -0400 Investigating the evolution of cell division mechanisms in Ichthyosporea
人工智能算法绘制神经退行性疾病中的蛋白质聚集特征蛋白质聚集是影响大脑的多种神经退行性疾病的根源，例如阿尔茨海默病和痴呆症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/AI-algorithm-maps- Protein-clumping-characteristics-in-neurodogenic-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/AI-algorithm-maps- Protein-clumping-characteristics-in-neurodogenic-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=436fafaa-4953-4c81-a585-942050ea9712 Thu, 23 May 2024 15:25:55 -0400 AI algorithm maps protein clumping characteristics in neurodegenerative disorders
